content.detailedDescription:
Walking back to my home on property i looked up and saw what i thought was the first star of the night. the sun had set already and there were a few small elongated clouds near the horizon but it was still light enough and clear enough to see a clear sunset. the bright light i thought was a star or maybe even a reflection of a aircraft. i walked into the house and went to a west window where i observed the bright light still in its location> not moving   it did appear to be just hanging in the air motionless. it was a great distance away,twenty miles,probably the next town over,maybe more. i then got a pair of binoculars and got it in view for about a minute. at that point the object accelerated leaving behind the widest and most colorful contrails i have ever seen, now i thought it could be a meteor. this lasted for less then ten seconds and when the object reached the thin cloud bank it made a 90 degree turn to the right (to the nw)in the cloud bank leaving a solid contrail at a incredible speed and disappeared.This was all observed at a distance of at least twenty miles away. the time that the object started moving to the time it disappeared was less then twenty five seconds.
my background for the past forty years has been in aviation as a mechanic and i know aircraft and how they move, this was something that was not of our design.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: While walking back to home, saw a bright white circle at a great distance

content.detailedDescription: This bright ligth was flowing slow over the houses of the nearborhood,no noise and change direcci���n fom north to est.I fill this report on time  tomorow sent the video
content.summary: I was out of my house and i see a bright ligth too slow moved,i went for my videocam and i see, don't was a plane or helicopter and i recorder.

content.detailedDescription: On february 22, 2014 at 7;20 am, i was on my way home from work when i noticed what appeared to be a very large cylinder in the sky. at first i thought it was stationary until i pulled over to get a better look.It seemed to move slowly in a north west direction. i could not see any wings or contrail and from my distance it seemed to be much bigger than a jet. to me it seemed 2 or 3 times bigger but i know it is hard to judge something that high up. i will say this definitely caught my attention when i saw it.
content.summary: Saw what appeared to be a large craft going slowly across sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on 65 n towards nashville at around 4:30pm, glanced out the window and saw a bright white shining light. it looked at least twice the size that venus or jupiter appear in our night sky but this was in the afternoon in clear blue skies. within a second it faded to a tiny white dot i could barely see then was gone. at first glance i thought it was venus but had never seen anything so bright or that big. i was shocked when it disappeared, especially so fast. i was pretty excited after seeing it because i've never seen anything like it before. it definitely blew me away. i saw several planes and jets right before and after the sighting and this was neither.
content.summary: A bright white light caught my eye and within a second faded to a tiny white dot and was gone.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of december 28, 2013, at approximately 7pm, i was sitting in my mother's house talking with her and my sister-in-law, when my brother came in from checking the outside water spigots and said something like, "get ready for the alien invasion."  i thought he was talking about the flashing christmas orb on my mother's enclosed side porch, which my brother would have been able to see through the blinds.  we laughed, then he insisted he wasn't kidding, and that we should look outside.  we all went to the side porch door and looked out, myself and my sister-in-law stepping out onto the porch steps.  my brother pointed to the sky, southwest, at about a 45 degree angle.  all of us saw a glowing, amber-colored orb, rising in the sky.  we could faintly hear a sort of pulsating hum, which we thought must be some sort of propulsion system.  then we saw that there were more orbs rising from some unknown point, one after another.  they seemed to be moving at a fairly slow rate of speed, perhaps like a small plane, but there were no exterior lights or typical airplane engine noise.  the orbs themselves glowed, sort of shimmering.  i asked for someone to bring my iphone so i could video the event, which i did for 2 minutes 45 seconds.  during the event my sister-in-law and i saw possibly as many as 50 of the orbs ascend from apparently the same place to the southwest, rise one after another into the sky, some moving in a northward direction, but more moving toward the east.  as they rose, eventually they disappeared from view, though i could not tell if that was due to clouds, altitude, or if the objects actually got dimmer and dimmer. after i stopped videoing, my sister-in-law and i stayed there and watched for several more minutes; when nothing different happened, we finally went inside, but the objects had not completely stopped appearing when we stopped watching.  when i saw the first object, i thought perhaps it was a weather balloon being launched, though why there would be a pulsing hum i could not figure out.  but when the objects just kept appearing, probably for about 10 minutes, i could not believe so many weather balloons would be launched from the same place at one time.  i did not feel fear or dread, just curiosity, and a bit of amazement.  i fully expected to see or hear an explanation of the event on the news the next morning, but i have seen and heard nothing at all to date. regarding the video i took with my iphone, sadly i cannot seem to email it to myself so i can save it to my computer hard drive, and cannot get it to publish to youtube.  but i would love to be able to share it so that this event can be fully investigated.
content.summary: A series of perhaps 50 amber, glowing orbs rose into the sky one after another with a pulsing sound, then dispersed and disappeared from view.

content.detailedDescription: I was woke from my sleep by my wife she asked me what is that noise. all i could hear was a deep tone hum, so i looked out of the bedroom window to see what was making the noise and could not see anything, so i opened the window to get a better look. the hum was still continuing just one long tone. i was leaning out the window to get a better look the road was quiet (being a dead end no through traffic ) all i could hear was the hum no other sounds not even bird song that we can usually at that time of morning. by now the hum had been going on for 15 to 20 minuets. not sure if was the hum or just that i was still half a sleep but it was getting difficult to think or focus my thoughts. then there was 3 bright white flashes as if someone had set a camera flash off in my face 3 times in a row with only a second between each flash, as soon as the 3rd flash happened the hum just stopped and then i could hear bird song and the sound of light traffic in the distance but no moving cars in my road or other roads close by. went back to bed with a mild headache.
content.summary: Deep constant hum with 3 flashes of light like a camera flash

content.detailedDescription: No description
content.summary: No description

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright shiny goldish round orb out my living room window so got my camera and went outside to get some pictures, i clearly saw two of them shiny somewhat pulsating lit, when i uploaded to my computer i saw there was a whole lot of them. they were over the ocean, seemed less than a 1/2 mile away, but am sure were further, after watching a while i came back in the house and just watched them out the window til they simply vanished. we are half way between rosarito and ensenada, numerous neighbors are also reporting seeing the crafts/orbs.
content.summary: Bright shiny is here often in early evenings the last 3 years

content.detailedDescription:
Launching a boat on the west side of lac vieux dessert in vilas county wi. i noticed to the north east above the lake several jet contrails in perfect circles. within minutes i saw a large aircraft flying from the west towards the east, then flying north the plane was a military aircraft olive drab in color, the plane had a circular radar dome on the top of the middle section of the plane .I have been near this type of aircraft at airshows being familiar with it size and the plane appeared to the size of a lear jet, i thought the plane would be about 7 to 10 miles from me.

as i watched the plane make a circle, leaving a contrail, i noticed as it started a similar path, that 8-10 of it's lenghts ahead of the plane the light cloud cover was splitting as if something the plane was following was causing the light clouds to open in a wedge.

i watched the clouds continue to split open and the plane continue follow in the open path the invisable object made, the plane continued making the circles and drifted north until i lost sight of it behind the forest in the ottawa national forest.

i could see the plane clearly,i wore suglasses, i took them off, i used a small binoculars, but what ever was splitting the clouds ahead of the radar plane was invisable.
content.summary: Invisable

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on maybank highway aprox. 6:30 pm. this incredibly bright and oddly shaped light was suddenly just there in the sky to the right of the road. at first i thought it was a helicopter with a search light but neither my son nor myself could see anything behind the light. the was no sound either. (my window was down). the light was pointy and shaped like the star in nativity scenes. i felt like it was pointed at me. it was in veiw for 3 to 5 minutes. after we passed it my son could still see the light he said it was on the front of a funny shaped plane.  the wings of the plane were at the back. we stopped at the car wash for change. i was very nervous. we were at the intersection of main rd and maybank hwy at 6:40.We did not reach the city limits of hollywood until 7:30 or so which bothers me greatly.
content.summary: Driving south on maybank highway .This light suddenly appeared in the sky  ahead of us. it was stationary and silent

content.detailedDescription:
This maybe something or nothing.
this picture was taken by my cellphone camera. late afternoon. the view is looking east south east from the back deck of our cottage.The setting sun is behind me and it was illuminating the sky and clouds which i thought was a nice picture.
i did not look at the picture immediately but about one month later. 
i did not notice the lights (shown in photo) over the horizon at the time. nor did i observe any aircraft in the area or passing over my position.
our lake constists of mostly seasonal cottages and as a result is very quiet at that time of year, late october.
i did not hear any sounds such as aircraft. 
there is a canadian forces base about 150 km south east of our cottage. 
i was quite supprised when i looked at the picture as i didnt notice anything abnormal at the time the photo was taken. 
there are six sets of lights in formation all about the same elevation and the appear to be parallel with each other. 
when the picture is enlarged the lights are dual, like headlights.
content.summary: Photo of six sets of lights above horizon, no sound heard, headed directly toward my position, did not pass over to my knowledge

content.detailedDescription:
In nov. 2007 i was at my hunting lease outside (nw) of moran tx which is s/e of albany and east of 
abilene tx. as i was getting ready to head out to the stand, i had the lights all off around the camp and being out in the middle of no where it was very quiet.  i heard a buzzing sound approaching from the east and looked up to see the outline of what i thought for all these years was a b1 stealth bomber, no lights and lower than i figured one should be flying, less than 500 feet.  i thought this was cool.  later that day i noticed more than usual military helicopter traffic flying in almost the same path of the object but flying to the east.  after years of thinking it was a b1, i was told by a friend that lives in abilene that there were no b1's at dyess afb and to his knowledge none have ever been there. 

thank you,
billy mars
content.summary: Heard a buzzing sound looked up

content.detailedDescription:
We were in bed could not  sleep. wife said theres those lights again i told you about,so i watched them
saw rotating lights would kind of blink in and out but each time it was bigger than befor after looking at this thing for around 40 minutes
we found it very close to our house hanging over our only large tree on the east side of our house
then after a while we saw it sprinkle the tree with what looked like fire flys but they were not that at all these were too bright for that they were falling to the ground and all around the tree the small tree about 30 feet away was stunted and did not bloom for 2 years after this happend
and also i need to tell you our property fence is the u.S.D.A. research area
and i can tell you they are suppose to be doing food research but i think more is going on there
i have more to tell so should you contact me ill be more than glad to tell my story,, my wife will too
content.summary: Saw lights in the night sky after a while of watching it came in to our fence line

content.detailedDescription: Silver reflective disk as large as a house seen reflecting in sunset sun no sound made.  coming off 81 exit onto blackman st.  amazing to see.
content.summary: There was an opening in the clouds and the silver disk went from right to left.

content.detailedDescription:
1st sighting ---  feb 23, 2014 - in marco island fl on vacation. sitting on my balcony on 6th floor overlooking gulf of mexico. night was clear with no clouds and light and variable winds at approx 9pm with my wife and daughter. our balcony was slightly obstructed by a few palm trees and also a building slightly to the right of our balcony. the building was not as high as our balcony but could not see the the entire view of the gulf. i noticed an electric blue light in the distance {solid color}at a southwest position - size of the north star. my eyes were immediately drawn to the color as i've never seen an aircraft with that color light. the light was just hovering in the sky then quickly moved to the left of its original position. traveled about 12 inches {from my view}. at this time - it was behind a palm tree but you could still see it partially through the leaves. it then hovered for about 10 seconds and made another quick move to the left {about 4 inches}and and made approx a 90 degree fast turn up and stopped. it then came back the same exact way to the right and once again i had an obstructed view with palm trees. stayed at that location for approx 10 seconds and the object began to change colors from electric blue to a bright pink then just disappeared.I had my daughter grab my cell which has a video camera and managed to take a quick video. i had to lay on the floor of the balcony to capture the image {between palm tree leaves} but could not get a good view. because the view was so poor - i was unable to capture the object turning pink. everyone was amazed at that point. approximately 15 minutes later, my daughter noticed that the object was back but it was dimmer and farther southwest than the first time sighted. i took my phone and ran to the pool area {5th floor} and watched the object get brighter {electric blue}the object hovered and began to pulsate pink and blue {the video attached is very shaky, the object was stationary for the most part, the movement was from me holding camera phone}as the object hovered and pulsated pink and blue it began to descend at a slow pace. unfortunately, the descent i did not capture, i was trying to watch with my naked eyes and camera at same time. it descended out of my view behind a building.  {the video isnt that great and seeing the object in person had better clarity}there are 2 videos attached with this sighting - 1 fast and crappy and 1 in better condition. you'll notice the object get larger - that was me zooming in.

2nd sighting -same night about 40 minutes later.
after witnessing the first event, i decided to walk to the beach to see if i could see it again, hopefully to get a better view and also to see if anyone was on the beach, possibly flying a remote helicopter - no one was on beach... i stood on the beach and looked around the sky. lots of stars, crescent moon. i looked to my south west position over the gulf and saw nothing. within 5 minutes a red faint blinking light appeared. i started to video but could not capture on video because it was too faint. as i watched this light it then became two lights. the original light was still faint red but the second light was brighter. the objects just sort of sat in the same position. i began to video and you 'll see 3/4 through the video both lights. i also made sure to put a high rise building in view at times {to the right} i videoed for about 2 minutes and eventually the objects moved slowly out of view to the right, past the buildings.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 separate sightings , same night, both with diff characteristics

content.detailedDescription: I was on the shore of north moose lake ten minutes from where i live and i have lived in this area all my life so i know this area real well i was out bird watching that day and immediately i noticed this huge ufo. knew right away it didn't belong there. bought my camera home and down loaded them onto my computer to have a better look at it and to my amazement i saw this ufo hovering over the lake nothing like i have ever seen before and in broad daylight. i contacted a elder who lives nearby he came over too see the photos and i asked him where i was taking these picture he knew the location immediately. he assured me that not even a cruise liner would be able to keep afloat in these waters not even in the middle of our lake its to shallow for anything that huge. my dad went out the next day to check it out with his quad and binoculars he seen it and then he dropped his cap from his lens he bent over to pick it up and when he stood up straight to take another look through his binoculars it was gone. i have held on to this photographs for 2 yrs not showing the public or media not know what to do with them. but i know what i have captured and i know for a fact that these photos can be used for science and investigating. wanting to sell them if the price is right.
content.summary: I know right away what i have captured it wasn't from this world

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the road and seeing stars ...An object travelling with massive speed ..Like a star in low altitutde..Towards soth east ..No planes where there ...Its moving in straing line without any sound..
content.summary: Travelled towards south east ..With massive speed ...Without sound

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from picking up my wife up from work when i noticed some lights out of the corner of my eye.  at first i thought it was just a reflection on the window as it was night time. once i turned and saw the bright lights in the sky i stopped driving to look at them.  i pointed at them and told my wife to look, she immediately said "what is that".  the three lights were dimming and reappearing for about 30 seconds when the first one split into two lights and disappeared.  the middle light dimmed and reappeared a few more times then just disappeared.  the third light dimmed and reappeared a few more times before it split into three lights that all disappeared.
content.summary: Three lights in the sky dimming then brightening two of the light seemed to separate into multiple lights before they all disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Actually, i witnessed two sightings, boh identical, in oklahoma within weeks of each other.
the first one occured when driving on interstate 44 from tulsa to okc. it was about 2300. weather was clear. there was very little trafic around me. there are few towns or houses along that stretch. i was driving east to west and actually had some of the okc landmarks in sight. i've made that run on coutless occasions. the radio tower lights were clearly visible from several miles away.
from high altitude this ball of light 'formed' about 30 degrees off my right hand side, about 1 to 1.5 miles away. it descended rapidly, going from a very high altitude to treetop in a few seconds. it disappeared at tree top level. 
the angle at which i first observed it and to where it disappeared  made it look as if it were about 1/2 mile north of the interstate. from the time it formed to the time i made my closest approach was probably a minute or less. i fully expected to see the fire of an airplane crash and had already mentally prepared myself to view some really horrific injuries. when i made my closest point of approach there was nothing there. i could see some houses throught the trees, but all was quiet.
the second event was much like the first. in oklahoma, on interstate 40 around henrietta. the only difference was i wasn't very close to the point of disappearance.
content.summary: Blue white orb descended from high alitude

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from picking up my wife up from work when i noticed some lights out of the corner of my eye.  at first i thought it was just a reflection on the window as it was night time. once i turned and saw the bright lights in the sky i stopped driving to look at them.  i pointed at them and told my wife to look, she immediately said "what is that".  the three lights were dimming and reappearing for about 30 seconds when the first one split into two lights and disappeared.  the middle light dimmed and reappeared a few more times then just disappeared.  the third light dimmed and reappeared a few more times before it split into three lights that all disappeared.
content.summary: Three lights in the sky dimming then brightening two of the light seemed to separate into multiple lights before they all disappeared

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:30pm on 2/26/14 i witnessed 7 objects in formation moving extremely fast through the sky. there were elevated amounts of air traffic, and in comparison to the planes, i would estimate they were moving about ten times as quickly. i would estimate at an altitude of 1000ft, but i am not trained to estimate so this may be inaccurate. they were moving through the lower layer of the clouds, as i recall a "haze" around them. they were white, but not to bright. they were almost in v formation, and had a sort of slight horizontal movement as they streaked across the sky. they were egg/saucer/oval shaped. the sighting lasted about 6 seconds from beginning to end. i endured the bitter cold and wind, with camera in hand hoping they would return, but was unable to get a glimpse of anything unusual throughout the night and early morning.
content.summary: Seven objects in formation moving extremely fast from nnw to sse.

content.detailedDescription: We were all sound asleep.  i heard a noise and saw a flash so bright it went into the house from the covered patio and kitchen window down the back hall and woke me.  i thought a transformer blew.  i got up to go check.  my daughter was on the step stool reaching towards the window in her gown but now i think it was her in the front of the patio door and son in window.  they did not respond as though they did not hear me.  i literally shielded my eyes and had to grab them both from their spots. they as adults can verify this.  the next day and many years later a circle in the back yard of great green grass there remained a ring of no growth maybe 4 x 4 circumference.
content.summary: I awoke to a noise and brightness to find my daughter on stepstool in kitchen and son at patio door both mesmorized and being drawn towards an overpowering light and pull

content.detailedDescription:
At home eating !
peeing off the back porch .
very strange !
red balls going north then east.I called the police and it was all recorded !
the police had time to come to my house and whitness the end of this event.
thinking post 911 thoughts !
my third siting in 30 years.
at this location.
after group gathering to the east the "13th.Craft" going way faster, and much larger. araivd ! and in a second or less all 13 vanashed. into the dark sky.
content.summary: Strange , real !

content.detailedDescription: Observed a row of 7 large lights that dwarfed streetlights far closer than object, they first apeared around 8pm than go out about 30 to 45 minuites later, they were in a straight line,very large, yellow orange, when observed through a rifle scope, the center of each light appeared red, they were just over treetop level, and remained stationary, walk to left or right one more would appear on that side as one would disappear on the other side. i, friends, family  and neigbors witnessed lights, i watched them almost every night for a few months, a few days went by not observing, looked, but they never returned, we couldnt form any opinion as to what they were, didnt appear to be a game field, rows of lights used in farming, nothing but woods for 7 to 10 miles or so across jordon hill rd nearest hyway.
content.summary: 7 large row of lights

content.detailedDescription:
1. the first time i noticed it was a couple months ago in the sky outside my bathroom window. its been happening almost every night on a clear sky .

2. i noticed the object because of the brightness and flashing colors and speed it was going.

3. when i first saw it i thought it was a ufo because nothing else looked or moved like it.

4. there were different ones some of them were oval shaped and some triangle or a diamond shaped. they had very bright amber orbs that flashed and pulsated randomly. other ones i saw had red and green lights on each side and a bright glowing orb in the middle. these things hovered then shot up in the sky, shot left and right across the sky, and even shut off its lights

5. my first reaction was just in amazement and i immediately grabbed my camera

6. i lose sight of it when it shoots up into the sky or shuts its lights off
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ive been seeing glowing, pulsating red, white and green lights hovering, shooting up and across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
As i was leaving work from my evening shift i got into my car and drove north towards oviedo marketplace blvd. i witnessed two lights in the sky through my front windshield. i turned right (south) onto oviedo marketplace blvd and then over the 417 overpass i saw the same two lights on my left hand side on my driver���s side (east). i also witnessed 3 helicopters hovering close to it. when i passed over the overpass heading south, i heard jets approaching and they looked military, travelling very fast toward the lights direction. i ended up counting 3 jets. 
 as i approached sr 426 i lost the object in the trees.
 my son also works late and he asked me did you see the same thing i saw dad? ���and i said yes. there was a lot of activity in the sky tonight.
content.summary: Leaving work from my evening shift notice 3 helicopters and two large bright white lights. as i was driving i notice 3 military jets coming in very fast

content.detailedDescription: Well went i saw this ship i was outside on my back yard looking the police helicopter they was looking for someone then i saw this weird cloud on the south not far away from me went the helicopter left i saw the lights come on inside this cloud then this ship come of the cloud that went i saw this big thing and start moving on my way i did describe like a flower only with three petals on each petal was three oval lights one big one on the middle and two small ones on each side around this petals a lot of big windows on each wing or petals and glow orange lights around like clear shield i do not hear any noise went i did saw this i know what was i was very happy  to see them also was spinning opposites of the clock after this sighting i went inside the house to tell my family before that i lose sight of this ship over the house i am very happy to see i will never going to forget this day tank you guys they here i call the orange flower my older brothers =======
content.summary: Ship propeller

content.detailedDescription:
My dog woke me up just before 2am so i took her outside thinking she needed take care of business. while looking towards the east i saw the entire eastern half of the night sky flash bright green. it lasted long enough to be able to look up, see the flash, and observe it across the sky (around half a second or so). it flashed two more times over the course of a couple minutes. from my vantage point there was no way to discern the point of origin of the flash. it simply filled the sky immediately with bright green, as if someone just turned on a light switch. after about 5 mins i went back inside and immediately checked twitter. i saw that one person had tweeted something similar within the past 5 minutes. i tweeted them back that i saw the same thing, and they confirmed they were in los angeles as well (didn't say exactly where in la).

i can provide a screenshot of our twitter conversation if needed.
content.summary: Brilliant solid green light flashed and filled entire night sky

content.detailedDescription:
On monday night (2-24-14) around 7:30 pm, i walked into my backyard to throw away garbage. north west of me i saw 3 red lights moving in unison toward me and i heard a low roaring sound. the way the lights appeared was a different configuration than i have ever seen on an airplane.

i ran inside and got my girlfriend. the lights flew over my neighbor's house, 2 houses west of us and as it passed 3 streets south of us a few more red lights suddenly turned on.  we watched a row of red lights drift in a south west direction for a couple minutes before i couldn't see them anymore yet i could still hear the roar. the light formation was half the width of the neighborhood block.

i ran inside and told my mother. less than 5 minutes later i walked back outside and heard the roaring sound again, louder. i looked up and flying directly over me, coming from the east, i clearly saw a dark v-shape with  four red lights underneath each side of it forming a v. the same red lights i saw before. there are 50 ft palm trees in the front yard and the object was at least 100-150 ft from the ground. it sharply turned south when it was 2 houses west of me and followed the same path i saw the first time.

as it flew away i noticed that the object appeared completely flat with nothing visible besides the red lights. across the street from me is fresno high school and the outdoor lights that illuminate the track/field were on since dozens of people were exercising out there. i was shocked that i clearly saw a dark v-shape against the night sky and it moved quite slow. if i had a bike i could have kept up with its speed. i lost sight of it after a couple minutes. i even ran out into the front street with my mother to get a better look.

it wasn't until then that i realized that the row of lights i saw fly away the first time formed a v pattern too. i was stunned. by the time i realized i should chase after it in my car, it was gone. i was unable to get any pictures with my phone. within 10 minutes, a small airplane and a helicopter flew back and forth over the object's path.

the next day (2-25-14) i found out online that pictures were taken across town of a glowing disc shaped object just 1 hour before my sighting and a few days prior, seven glowing objects were also seen/ photographed in the same area as the disc. 

i know what airplanes look like and the object i saw not only dwarfed any plane i have ever seen, it also flew as slow and low as the local police helicopter does.
content.summary: Black v-shape with red lights flew by home twice 100-150 ft above me

content.detailedDescription:
On the lake  pontoon   5 people aboard lunch blue skys clear day no wind disc overmountain top silver disc standing still 5 minutes we approach disc with boat up to 1000 ft from it a very clear view unbelievable suddenly quick move in straight line 4000 ft stops and shakes like magnetic forces then back to first position then stos and shakes then moves back to center stops shakes and twist sideways and takes off in space blink of a eyes the most amaizing experience for the 5 of us at close range would like to discuss the situation with u guys
  best regards
content.summary: Silver disc 30 ft diameter magnetic antigravital seems like no sound
